name: Michael CORRY, Renee Corry and Michelle Corry, a Minor, et al., Petitioners, v. Sister Elizabeth M. HART and Diocese of Allentown

parties: Michael CORRY, Renee Corry and Michelle Corry, a Minor, et al., Petitioners, v. Sister Elizabeth M. HART and Diocese of Allentown.

opinions.text: Petition granted, No. 112 E.D. Appeal Docket 1985.

casebody.head_matter:
496 A.2d 1144
Michael CORRY, Renee Corry and Michelle Corry, a Minor, et al., Petitioners, v. Sister Elizabeth M. HART and Diocese of Allentown.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 12, 1985.
